title: Good Agricultural Practices Training Graduation Ceremony

tasks.task: Attend a graduation ceremony for agricultural training.
subtasks: Dress appropriately for the ceremony.
Enter the ceremony venue.
Find a seat or stand appropriately.
Participate in applause for participants and organizers.
Express appreciation for participants' achievements.
Highlight the importance of bilateral collaboration.
Applaud the organizers.
Mention local purchase promotion.
Discuss diversification and increased domestic production.
Address food security and nutrition.
Acknowledge the role of farmers in food production.
Discuss the Ministry's mandate in the context of inflation and supply chain disruptions.
Mention soil management, pest control, irrigation, post-harvest handling, and market strategies.
Explain the focus on efficient production and sustainable farming.
Give appreciation to the Ministry of Agriculture and Taiwan Technical Mission.
Acknowledge their role in organizing the workshop.
